p: The current retrospective study was conducted on samples collected in the context of National Surveillance Program of Iran for Aedes-borne arboviral infections in accordance with the protocols approved by Iranian Centre for Disease Control and Management Committee. Due to the retrospective nature of the study, it was not possible to obtain informed consent from the participants; however, all data were analyzed anonymously and all experiments were carried out according to the relevant laws and guidelines of the ethical standards of the Declaration of Helsinki.
